title: Genealogists love DNA and so do the police
description:
The genetic genealogy website used to find the Golden State Killer has been sold to a DNA forensics company.

Featuring:
@MeganMolteni
Peter Aldhous

Links:
10 Years Ago, DNA Tests Were The Future Of Medicine. Now They’re A Social Network — And A Data Privacy Mess

A DNA Firm That Caters to Police Just Bought a Genealogy Site

Host:
Arielle Duhaime-Ross (@adrs), host and lead reporter of Reset

About Recode by Vox:
Recode by Vox helps you understand how tech is changing the world — and changing us.

Follow Us:
Newsletter: Recode Daily 
Twitter: @Recode
